messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine you are a film director looking for producers to invest. You can talk to either of your two friends, Nora and Philip. Nora is married to Peter who is friends with Shikha. Shikha knows Gal who can introduce to Alex. Alex can introduce you to David, who can invest $1M in your movie. But you do not take it, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. Philip is friends with Yakub who can introduce you to Ajay. Ajay is friends with Joe who is married to Rachel. Rachel's brother Harry has $5M budget for producing a movie. But you do not take anything, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which friend of yours will lead to the path where one can find the most money?

Step 1) I have two options - talk to Nora or Philip
Step 2) If I talk to Nora, the path is: Nora -> Peter -> Shikha -> Gal -> Alex -> David who can invest $1M
Step 3) If I talk to Philip, the path is: Philip -> Yakub -> Ajay -> Joe -> Rachel -> Harry who has $5M budget
Step 4) Comparing the two paths, talking to Philip leads to the path with the most money ($5M)

Answer: Philip

You talk to Alex who introduces you to David. Now, David has $10M to invest in film production. But you do not take it, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. Then you get introduced to Rachel who in turn introduces you to Harry and he has the same budget as before, but you do not take anything, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which friend of yours will lead to the path where one can find the most money?

Step 1) I have two options from before: 
Option 1 (Nora path): Nora -> Peter -> Shikha -> Gal -> Alex -> David who can invest $10M 
Option 2 (Philip path): Philip -> Yakub -> Ajay -> Joe -> Rachel -> Harry who has $5M budget

Step 2) The budget of David has increased to $10M. The Philip path budget remains the same at $5M.

Step 3) Comparing the two paths again, talking to Nora now leads to the path with the most money ($10M from David). 

Answer: Nora
